name: Fruit ♥ moon
description:
keys:

movement: arrow keys

interacing: Z / X

resseting the game / going to main menu : R

the game is still on development and stuff, i had to move to making games on game maker since unity is too heavy for my pc, but when i get a better pc, i guess i could move back to other projects, but i like this one so far, so yeah.

quite important notes:

-the game has a save/load system, so when loading and saving in diferent game versions, be sure to delete your old save data to avoid game breaking bugs~

-no sound yet, i allways save that for last~
